Invite sent. And yes - it's sort of "nay with reasons"... Out there is many Turkish encoders who have been doing these titles for years. Same as Hindi - it just happened that i am not doing these... I think how encoders should stick to cinemas they like and more important - understand, not just a language, but cultural origins foremost.
thanks for invite..if u know any uploader u can consider my requests ...then suggest me his name..

Do Search one or two titles from the list, find who is uploader then click on his handle to see if he has uploaded other titles you look for. You  can find one who is productive and reliable and how he deals with requests by reading Comments on most popular torrents right there.

I seed the movie only, but regarding TV series, many did requested it over the years. I am not interested in encoding it, Net was full of Buffy packs (I downloaded it five-six years back and really tried to watch, but I haven't endured longer than five-six episodes). Well, if some show really have huge fan-base - why all torrents are dead? Or are they? Search on demonoid and on Google too. Usenet? Warez forums?
